GermlineCNVPipeline.CnmopsCNVCalling.cap.description: whether to cap extremely high average coverage windows to 2*cohort's average coverage quantile 99.9% value

GermlineCNVPipeline.CnmopsCNVCalling.chr.description: The name of the female sex chromosome in the genome. default is: chrX
The name of the male sex chromosome in the genome. default is: chrY

GermlineCNVPipeline.CnmopsCNVCalling.inp.description: Input sample BAM/CRAM file. one of the `input_bam_file`, `input_sample_reads_count` or `bed_graph` must be set

Inputs sample windowed coverage stored as GenomicRanges object in rds file. can be calculated using cn.mops::getReadCountsFromBAM R function.  one of the `input_bam_file`, `input_sample_reads_count` or `bed_graph` must be set

GermlineCNVPipeline.CnmopsCNVCalling.sav.description: Whether to save sample reads counts/cohort including sample/cnmops output data in csv format (additionally to RDS format). Default is: False.
Whether to save sample reads counts/cohort including sample/cnmops output data in hdf5 format (additionally to RDS format). Default is: False.

GermlineCNVPipeline.CombineCNVCalls.cnvp.description: Threshold for pN (fraction of reference genome gaps (N's) in call region) for cnvpytor calls. default=0.9

GermlineCNVPipeline.CombineCNVCalls.dele.description: Minimum length of deletions to be considered without jalign support. default=3000

GermlineCNVPipeline.CombineCNVCalls.dist.description: Distance threshold for merging CNV calls. default=1500

GermlineCNVPipeline.CombineCNVCalls.dupl.description: Minimum length of duplications to be considered for cn.mops calls. default=10000

GermlineCNVPipeline.CombineCNVCalls.jali.description: Minimum number of mismatches for jalign to consider a read as supporting a CNV candidate. default=1
Minimal number of supporting jaligned reads for deletions. default=1

GermlineCNVPipeline.bed_graph.description: Previously calculated input bedGraph files holding the coverage per base (outputs with the sequencing data).

GermlineCNVPipeline.cnmops_intersection_.description: Intersection cutoff with UG-CNV-LCR regions to filter out CNV calls. Default is:  0.5

GermlineCNVPipeline.cnmops_mapq_override.description: Reads mapping-quality cutoff for coverage aggregation used in cn.mops, default value is 1

GermlineCNVPipeline.cnmops_min_cnv_lengt.description: Minimum length for reporting CNV. Default is: 0

GermlineCNVPipeline.cnmops_min_width_val.description: Minimum of consecutive windows with a significant signal to consider for CNV reporting. Default is: 2

GermlineCNVPipeline.cnmops_parallel_over.description: Number of cpus for cn.mops run. Default value is 4

GermlineCNVPipeline.cnmops_window_length.description: Window length on which the read counts will be aggregated, default value is 500

GermlineCNVPipeline.cnvpytor_mapq_overri.description: Reads mapping-quality cutoff for coverage aggregation used in cnvpytor, default value is 0

GermlineCNVPipeline.cnvpytor_window_leng.description: Window length on which the read counts will be aggregated, default value is 500

GermlineCNVPipeline.cohort_reads_count_m.description: GenomicRanges object of the cohort reads count matrix in rds file format. default cohort can be found in the template.

GermlineCNVPipeline.create_md5_checksum_.description: Create md5 checksum for requested output files

GermlineCNVPipeline.disable_mod_cnv.description: whether to call moderate cnvs (Fold-Change~1.5 will be tagged as CN2.5 and Fold-Change~0.7 will be tagged as CN1.5). Default is: True

GermlineCNVPipeline.genome_windows.description: Bed file of the genome binned to equal sized windows similar to the cohort_reads_count_matrix.

GermlineCNVPipeline.merged_cohort_ploidy.description: Merged cohort ploidy file in bed format

GermlineCNVPipeline.ref_seq_names.description: Chromosome names for which coverage will be calculated

GermlineCNVPipeline.reference_genome.description: Genome fasta file associated with the CRAM file

GermlineCNVPipeline.reference_genome_ind.description: Fai index of the fasta file

GermlineCNVPipeline.skip_figure_generati.description: Skip CNV calls figure generation. please set to True if reference genome is not hg38. Default is: False
